synopsis.text:
Yuki-hime, Enma, and their eccentric team are back in a chilling, adult-oriented remake of Go Nagai's classic horror anime, Dororon Enma-kun. As the Demon Prince of the Underworld, Enma is tasked with hunting down rogue demons that have infiltrated the human realm, causing chaos and gruesome incidents in their wake. Joined by the icy Princess Yuki-hime and the mischievous Kappa, Enma forms the Enma Detective Agency to track down these malevolent spirits and restore order.

As darkness falls, the sleepless city becomes a breeding ground for evil. Demons lurk not only in the shadows but also within the depths of human hearts, preying on despair and unfulfilled desires. Enma's fire burns brightly as he and his team confront the sinister forces that plague humanity. Will they succeed in purging the world of these demonic threats, or will they succumb to the darkness that surrounds them? Join Enma and his allies as they embark on a thrilling, erotic, and suspenseful journey into the heart of darkness.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
